components.description: A plate of orange-brown curry with vegetables or meat, served with a mound of white rice. May represent kare-raisu, or Japanese curry, though commonly associated with India and other Asian cuisines.
components.title: Curry and Rice

description: A plate of orange-brown curry with vegetables or meat, served with a mound of white rice. May represent kare-raisu, or Japanese curry, though commonly associated with India and other Asian cuisines.
title: Curry and Rice

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Food symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: A plate of food containing curry and rice. Due to the origins of emoji being in Japan, this was most likely intended to be a Japanese curry, http://emojipedia.org/curry-and-rice/
emoji_net_data.name: curry rice

bn:00108622a: Having a piquant or pungent taste; spicy.

bn:00104941a: Of or relating to or characteristic of India or the East Indies or their peoples or languages or cultures
Of or relating to India or its people; or (formerly) of the East Indies.

bn:00087460v: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.

bn:00046300n: In optics, tilt is a deviation in the direction a beam of light propagates.
A deviation in the direction of a beam of light
The use of wine tasting descriptors allows the taster to qualitatively relate the aromas and flavors that the taster experiences and can be used in assessing the overall quality of wine.
The property possessed by a line or surface that departs from the vertical

bn:00024521n: Curry is a dish whose origins are Southern and Southeastern Asian cuisines, as well as New World cuisines influenced by them such as Trinidadian, Mauritian or Fijian.
A traditional medium strength Indian preparation utilizing wide variety of oriental spices to give rich flavor with abundant gravy.
(East Indian cookery) a pungent dish of vegetables or meats flavored with curry powder and usually eaten with rice

bn:00027206n: Dinner usually refers to the most significant meal of the day, which can be the noon or the evening meal.
The main meal of the day, often eaten in the evening.
A meal that is eaten in the late afternoon or evening daily.
Dinner usually refers to the most significant and important meal of the day, which can be the noon or the evening meal.
The main meal of the day served in the evening or at midday
Main meal of the day, or sometimes to the noon, early afternoon or evening meal

bn:02408742n: Rice and beans is a staple food in many cultures around the world.

bn:00067718n: Annual or perennial rhizomatous marsh grasses; seed used for food; straw used for paper
Seeds of the rice plant (Oryza sativa) used as food.
The seeds of this plant used as food.
Rice is the seed of the monocot plants Oryza sativa or Oryza glaberrima.

bn:00010203n: India, officially the Republic of India, is a country in South Asia.
Country in Southern Asia (Bharat). Official name: Republic of India.
A republic in the Asian subcontinent in southern Asia; second most populous country in the world; achieved independence from the United Kingdom in 1947
A country in South Asia, with the capital New Delhi.

Nelumbo nucifera. It is one of the names of the mythological character Krishna. Aravind?ksha, "lotus-eyed", appears as the 347th name of the Vishnu sahasranama. The variant spelling Aravind is more popular in North India. Aravindha is an uncommon variant and Arvindh is very rare.
India is a country on the Asian continent.

bn:00053993n: A meal is an eating occasion that takes place at a certain time and includes specific, prepared food, or the food eaten on that occasion.
The food served and eaten at one time
The food eaten at a meal.
Food that is prepared and eaten, usually at a specific time.
Eating that takes place at a specific time
Food served or eaten as a repast.
Meal is an eating occasion that takes place at a certain time and includes specific, prepared food, or the food eaten on that occasion.
Food that is prepared and eaten.

bn:00035650n: Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
